title.rendered: “IDF Operations in Gaza: Givati Brigade Dismantles Terrorist Infrastructure”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Combat soldiers from the Givati Brigade located terrorist infrastructures in Rafah, including mortar shells ready for launch; the IDF continues to operate in the Gaza Strip.

IDF forces continue to operate in the Strip from the ground, air, and sea. During an operation by the combat soldiers of the Givati Brigade in the Rafah area, one of the unit’s drones identified an armed terrorist cell moving towards them. The forces responded quickly and eliminated the cell. Additionally, the soldiers located and destroyed mortar shells ready for launch.

Meanwhile, the combat forces of the 401 Brigade located and destroyed shafts and subterranean infrastructures identified in the Tel el-Sultan area.

In the center of the Gaza Strip, combat soldiers from the Alexandroni Brigade (3) raided several military buildings where various weapons were found.

Attached are photos from the forces’ operations in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC2107202494289024822
